articles.title: Emiliano Martinez responds to penalty rule change after World Cup final antics
articles.description: Emiliano Martinez made headlines for the right and wrong reasons during the World Cup, with his penalty shootout antics slammed as "despicable" following Argentina's final victory over France
articles.content:
Emiliano Martinez insists that it'll be "no problem" if FIFA change the rules for goalkeepers during penalty shootouts after his much-maligned antics at the World Cup were labelled "despicable."

articles.description: Luck Ra and Ke Personajes earn their first No. 1 on the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 with "Ya No Vuelvas."
articles.content:

articles.description: The British No1 overcame an early wobble to win in straight sets over Juan Manuel Cerundolo
articles.content:

articles.description: Lionel Messi will be 39 for the 2026 World Cup to be held in the United States, Canada and Mexico.
articles.content:
